mapper.sql: ID, NUM_IID, TITLE, PICT_URL, IMG_URL, SMALL_IMAGES, RESERVE_PRICE, ZK_FINAL_PRICE, USER_TYPE, PROVCITY, ITEM_URL, SALE, SALE_COUNT, TYPE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME, START_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into product (ID, NUM_IID, TITLE, PICT_URL, IMG_URL, SMALL_IMAGES, RESERVE_PRICE, ZK_FINAL_PRICE, USER_TYPE, PROVCITY, ITEM_URL, SALE, SALE_COUNT, TYPE, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME, START_TIME ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numIid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smallImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zkFinalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sale,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

ID,
NUM_IID,
TITLE,
PICT_URL,
IMG_URL,

mapper.update:
update product
NUM_IID = #{numIid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICT_URL = #{pictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG_URL = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMALL_IMAGES = #{smallImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESERVE_PRICE = #{reservePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ZK_FINAL_PRICE = #{zkFinalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVCITY = #{provcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_URL = #{itemUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALE = #{sale,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
SALE_COUNT = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update product set NUM_IID = #{numIid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICT_URL = #{pictUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_URL = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMALL_IMAGES = #{smallImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE_PRICE = #{reservePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZK_FINAL_PRICE = #{zkFinalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVCITY = #{provcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_URL = #{itemUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE = #{sale,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SALE_COUNT = #{saleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select p.* from product p LEFT JOIN mem_product m on m.PRODUCT_ID=p.ID where 1=1
and p.expire_Time > '${expireTime}'
and m.MEMBER_ID='${memberId}'
order by p.create_time desc
${page_sql}

SELECT p.* FROM product p LEFT JOIN out_count o ON p.ID = o.PRODYCT_ID WHERE o.USER_ID = '${userId}' ORDER BY o.CREATE_TIME DESC
${page_sql}
